author: hollowstrawberry
description: Replaces the payday and slot commands with slightly prettier versions and adds slash command versions.
install_msg:
ðŸ’µ __**EconomyPrettier**__
```Cog installed. Instructions:
1. Load it with [p]load economyprettier
2. Optionally, enable slash commands with [p]slash enablecog economyprettier
  2.1. Then do [p]slash sync
  2.2. Then restart Discord
3. You should be able to use [p]slot and [p]payday as usual.```
short: Replaces the payday and slot commands with slightly prettier versions and adds slash command versions.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any user data.
